entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • When explicitly loading a many-to-many navigation, owned types are re-loaded for the source side #32956
  • Update object value by with key #32955
  • Microsoft.Data.SqlClient.SqlException: 'Argument data type NULL is invalid for argument 2 of JSON_VALUE function.' #32952
  • CVE-2024-0056 Microsoft.Data.SqlClient and System.Data.SqlClient SQL Data Provider Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability #32950

Closed

  • Performance Degradation with Async method and nvarchar(max) column #32948
  • AlterColumnOperation_with_identity_legacy fails consistency after commit to support resetting Identity #32946
    9.0.0
  • Copied entity with navigation properties causes duplication of navigation entities #32904

PullRequests

Created

  • Split SQL Server functional tests into two projects #32953

Merged

  • Fix failing test related to SQL Server identity reseeding #32949
  • Fix copy paste typo #32951
    community-contribution

Updated

  • Stop specifying incorrect column name in snapshot for owned type of generic entity type #32937
  • [release/8.0] Throw for empty strings in primitive collection columns #32928
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0] Don't assume that FK of skip navigation is non-null #32925
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.3
